txt.en: Collect mushroom ingredients from the mushroom crate
You collected the mushroom ingredient
Collect fish for the meal from the barrel of fish
You collected the spice ingredient
Deliver the Hearty Meal to a Thorin's Hall meal table
A sneaky hobbit swiped the dish
Create a Thorin's Hall Hearty Meal then deliver it to a meal table to help all the workers perform at their peak.
'I am going to enjoy this. Thanks for wandering so nearby.'
You made a Thorin's Hall Hearty Meal. Complete the meal in the oven and deliver it to a meal table.

'Swift and sturdy legs! That is what we need down here in the depths.

'No doubt you noticed that the air this deep is stifling. Makes moving like walking through a running river. We have an answer for this problem. A Thorin's Hall Hearty Meal!

'Collect up the mushrooms, fish, and spice. Then craft the meal and deliver it to the table for meals.'
A meal providing exceptional leg strength and swiftness is a necessity in times like these. Try your hand at delivering this meal.
Eat the meal or deliver it to a meal table
<rgb=#ff0000>Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall ends</rgb>
Collect the ingredients needed to craft the Thorin's Hall Brew from the nearby fish barrel, mushrooms crate, and spice rack.
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid sneaky hobbits</rgb>
Deliver the platter of food to the meal table
You delivered the platter of food to the meal table
You collected the fish ingredient
Collect the mushroom ingredient from the mushroom crate
Collect the spice craft ingredient from the spice rack
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid sneaky hobbits</rgb>
You collected spice from the spice rack
You collected the mushroom ingredient
Place the Thorin's Hall Hearty Meal onto a meal table.
Fish ingredient collected
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
A sneaky hobbit swiped the dish
'Oh my goodness, this looks tasty.'
'Let me help you. It smells delicious.'
'I am pleased you stumbled by. I will enjoy this.'
'For me? You shouldn't have.'
'This looks and smells delectable.'
'I am happy to taste-test this for you.'
'You are so thoughtful in bringing this to me.'
Place the hearty meal onto a meal table
'I smelled this clear across the hall.'
'This is really for me? Oh this is a wonderful surprise.'
'Such a wonderful looking bit of food.'
'It smells full of spice and taste. What a treat!'
'It is time for a second breakfast... somewhere.'
'This smells so aromatic and delicious. I cannot wait.'
'I cannot recall such a wonderful smell from dwarf-food. I shall enjoy this.'
'Thank you for this wonderful gift. I will devour it presently.'
'As delicious as I expected.'
'Were you the cook? If so, that was delectable.'
'An excellent offering. Do you have any more?'
'I could eat one hundred of those.'
Place the Hearty Meal onto a meal table
'Hurry back! My tummy is grumbling already.'
'That was... spicy. Excuse me, please.'
Complete the meal in the oven then deliver it to the table
'So much flavor. Uh oh. Excuse me.'
'Something about that was... Oh dear. Good-bye.'
You lost the platter of food
'I do not mean to be rude, but I must go.'
Collect the fish ingredient from the fish barrel
'Delicious. But... umm... a bit... oh dear... sorry....'
Hard Tack Event: Special Meal
Collect craft ingredients from the spice rack
